name: DrunkardAlien
description:
Small game released in 72h for [Ludum Dare 51](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51) game jam with the "every 10 seconds" theme and the "jam" rules constraints.

As a drunkard alien escaped from zone 51 you have to survive in an hostile world

Playable on mobile (push left/right sides move and middle to jump)

or desktop :

space to jump
Cursor keys <-> or z/q-d to move.
Catch 51 pastis bottles before going back home
Check 10 seconds next change

Made with Unity 2021.3 and
- InfiniteRunnerEngine (Thanks MoreMountains !)
- Some graphics by Dall-e

Thanks for your vote at the LD51 here : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/drunkard-alien
